story.title: Our Story
story.content: KidParty was founded with a simple mission: to create unforgettable birthday experiences for children in Batumi. We believe every child deserves a magical celebration filled with joy, laughter, and wonderful memories.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: To provide safe, fun, and memorable party experiences that bring joy to children and peace of mind to parents.

safety.title: Safety First
safety.description: Your child's safety is our top priority

fun.title: Maximum Fun
fun.description: We create joyful experiences kids will never forget

team.title: Our Team
team.description: Our experienced team of party planners and entertainers are dedicated to making your child's special day perfect.
